description:
As a junior front-end developer at Zination, I worked on the Rhonda.ai project, which helps companies improve their hiring process by allowing them to screen and select employees more efficiently.
My responsibilities included integrating the applicant screening module, building a Rhonda saving tracker, implementing the Ask Rhonda feature, designing a pixel-perfect UI/UX, fixing bugs, and deploying the web application to production.

As a member of the development team at Hanaboso, I contributed to the North Dent project, a dental management web application. My focus was on building the UI with dynamic functionality using React.js & Node.js, creating a custom library for making API requests, and developing reusable components to avoid duplicating code.
I implemented various features such as authentication, global search, notifications, chat, patient listings, filter, edit, delete throughout the patient lists, etc. Furthermore, I collaborated with other team members to ensure a responsive and visually appealing UI, utilizing the latest web technologies.

At Spontivly, I played a crucial role in developing and maintaining web applications as a member of the development team. Additionally, I managed the team to ensure project success. One of my key contributions was building a library content management system that offered user-friendly features for creating and sharing new content with audiences.
I also helped architect the backend of the library content management system, utilizing express.js and MongoDB as a database. Furthermore, I implemented a complex search filter that enabled users to filter their content by type, status, tags, title, description, etc. I took charge of designing and developing the UI/UX, fixing numerous bugs, and deploying the web application to production.
